forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing for the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
